title: Tom Brady, Rams, Julian Edelman, and LeBron James
itunes:title: Tom Brady, Rams, Julian Edelman, and LeBron James
description:
Colin recaps the New England Patriots big win over the Los Angeles Rams and why it was more amazing for QB Tom Brady then some may think, what makes players like WR Julian Edelman special, and the recent Twitter comments by Los Angeles Lakers F LeBron James. Guests include Greg Jennings, Mark Schlereth, and Eric Mangini. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
